meanings.definition: A nitrogenous substance found in the spermatozoa of certain animals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the volutin in the sperm cells under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The volutin in the sperm cells plays a crucial role in fertilization.
meanings.sent3: The volutin in the sperm cells seemed to dance under the lens of the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The volutin in the sperm cells was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering volutin in the sperm cells sparkled like tiny stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A granular substance found in the cytoplasm of certain cells.
meanings.sent1: The doctor observed the volutin in the cell sample closely.
meanings.sent2: The presence of volutin in the cytoplasm indicates cellular activity.
meanings.sent3: The volutin in the cytoplasm seemed to be having a party of its own.
meanings.sent4: The volutin in the cytoplasm was like a bustling marketplace of activity.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant volutin in the cytoplasm pulsated with life and energy.
